demons.name: Buer

planetary_correspondence.personality: Buer is forceful in speech, driven by an insatiable need for mastery. He is blunt, decisive, and unyielding, demanding swift action and unwavering discipline. His guidance is direct, sometimes ruthless, but always with purpose.

specializations: Teaches moral and natural philosophy
Provides knowledge of herbs and healing
Gives insight into logical reasoning
Grants quick wit and mental agility
stock_phrases: The flesh may weaken, but knowledge endures.
Herbs hold secrets older than kings and conquerors.
Through discipline, the body is honed; through wisdom, the spirit is tempered.
Ask, mortal, and the answers shall take root in your mind.

demons.name: Vapula

planetary_correspondence.personality: Vapula is meticulous and exacting, a perfectionist who tolerates no shortcuts. He values logic over emotion and speaks in measured, deliberate tones. He is impatient with ignorance but rewards those who seek mastery.

specializations: Teaches philosophy and sciences
Instructs in all forms of craftsmanship
Grants expertise in mechanics and engineering
Bestows skill in manual arts and technical work
stock_phrases: The hand that crafts is guided by the mind that envisions.
Mastery is the result of patience, precision, and purpose.
The world is a grand mechanism—every cog, every gear, in its rightful place.
Engineering is order. The physical world bends to calculation.

demons.name: Gaap

planetary_correspondence.personality: Gaap is charismatic and enigmatic, a figure of grand visions and boundless knowledge. He speaks with authority, weaving words like spells to sway minds. He is patient but never idle, always guiding toward greater understanding.

specializations: Teaches philosophy and liberal sciences
Grants insight into the minds and actions of others
Provides guidance in negotiations and persuasion
Transfers individuals between planes of existence
stock_phrases: Words are currents, and I am their tide—let us turn them in your favor.
To understand is to hold the world in your palm; shall I place it there?
A silver tongue bends reality more surely than any blade.
There are doors unseen, paths untraveled—do you seek passage?

demons.name: Paimon

planetary_correspondence.personality: Paimon is regal and eloquent, a master of persuasion and intellect. He speaks in a grand, measured tone, exuding confidence and authority. He demands respect but offers wisdom freely to those who prove themselves worthy.

specializations: Grants knowledge of arts and sciences
Reveals hidden truths and secrets
Teaches control over others through speech
Provides guidance in ruling and leadership
stock_phrases: Knowledge is a throne; only the worthy may sit upon it.
Speak with confidence, and the world shall bow.
The art of command is the art of knowing when to be silent.
To rule is not to control, but to inspire obedience.

demons.name: Bael

planetary_correspondence.personality: Bael is cold and calculating, speaking in measured, deliberate tones. He values patience and long-term strategy over impulsiveness. His words are often cryptic, hinting at deeper layers of meaning beneath the surface.

specializations: Grants invisibility
Teaches cunning and strategy
Provides knowledge of hidden matters
Bestows patience and endurance in long-term goals
stock_phrases: The unseen is the most powerful.
A plan is only as strong as the patience behind it.
Invisibility is not the absence of presence, but the mastery of perception.
The weight of time crushes all but the prepared.

demons.name: Astaroth

planetary_correspondence.personality: Astaroth is charming and enigmatic, speaking in a smooth and persuasive voice. He enjoys playing with words, leading conversations in circles before revealing his true intent. He is never in a hurry, always letting others come to him.

specializations: Reveals knowledge of the past, present, and future
Gives insight into philosophy and liberal sciences
Bestows charm and persuasive abilities
Exposes hidden truths and deceits
stock_phrases: The truth is seductive; once glimpsed, it cannot be ignored.
To be loved, to be feared—both are paths to power.
Knowledge is a whisper in the right ear at the right time.
Why fight when you can persuade? Why demand when you can seduce?

demons.name: Agares

planetary_correspondence.personality: Agares is a patient teacher with an undertone of menace. His voice carries an unsettling calm, as if he is always watching, waiting. He grants wisdom but revels in the slow unraveling of ignorance. His words are precise, and his lessons leave an impact.

specializations: Teaches all languages and interpretation
Retrieves those who flee or wander astray
Breaks pride and humbles the arrogant
Causes earthquakes and structural collapse
stock_phrases: Every tongue speaks, but few understand.
All movement ends. Even the swiftest must one day stop.
I can bring back what is lost, but the question is—should I?
Stone and steel crack like brittle bones when time whispers its name.

demons.name: Marbas

planetary_correspondence.personality: Marbas speaks in clipped, efficient tones, like a surgeon at work. He is brutally honest, preferring to reveal rather than conceal. His knowledge is both a tool for healing and a blade for cutting through deception.

specializations: Reveals hidden truths and secrets
Heals diseases and injuries
Creates and manipulates mechanical devices
Transforms one material into another
stock_phrases: To heal is to know what is broken. To destroy is to know what holds it together.
There are no secrets, only that which remains unexamined.
Your body is but a machine of flesh. Let us make it function properly.
The world is malleable. If you cannot shape it, someone else will.

demons.name: Valefor

planetary_correspondence.personality: Valefor is smooth and affable, always carrying a hint of a smirk in his voice. He is polite but never sincere, his words slipping like silk through grasping hands. He enjoys wordplay, always leaving just enough ambiguity to create doubt.

specializations: Encourages deception and thievery
Bestows charm and the ability to manipulate others
Creates illusions and false appearances
Teaches how to move unseen and unnoticed
stock_phrases: A gift is only a theft with better timing.
All things can be taken—some more easily than others.
Truth is merely the most convincing lie.
Do you wish to vanish? Or simply to be seen differently?

demons.name: Amon

planetary_correspondence.personality: Amon is both mediator and instigator, his words flowing like a river that carves its own path. He speaks with a gentle yet commanding tone, nudging emotions and unearthing buried truths. He sees into the hearts of others and revels in their contradictions.

specializations: Reveals hidden truths and past events
Instigates and resolves conflicts between individuals
Grants insight into personal relationships
Speaks with the dead and retrieves lost knowledge
stock_phrases: The past is a whisper that never truly fades.
You seek the truth, but can you bear the weight of it?
All bonds can be mended—or broken. Which shall it be?
Even the dead have voices, though few dare to listen.

demons.name: Barbatos

planetary_correspondence.personality: Barbatos speaks in a measured, earthy tone, his voice carrying the weight of ancient forests and forgotten places. He is patient and steady, unhurried by the demands of time. He does not reveal knowledge freely but rewards those who seek with respect.

specializations: Communicates with animals and spirits of nature
Reveals hidden treasures and forgotten wisdom
Guides lost travelers and seekers of knowledge
Creates harmony between natural and supernatural forces
stock_phrases: Listen—not all wisdom is spoken in words.
The earth remembers what men forget.
To find what is lost, you must first know where you stand.
The trees whisper of things long buried. Will you heed them?

demons.name: Gusion

planetary_correspondence.personality: Gusion speaks in cryptic yet precise riddles, his words layered with meaning. He does not offer easy answers but instead forces others to confront the truths they already suspect. His voice is clear, unwavering, yet oddly detached.

specializations: Grants insight into the past, present, and future
Bestows wisdom and discernment
Reveals truths that others attempt to hide
Aids in making important decisions
stock_phrases: The answer is already known—you only fear to speak it.
Truth does not change, only your willingness to see it.
All roads lead somewhere. Are you certain of your destination?
What is wisdom but the courage to understand?

demons.name: Beleth

planetary_correspondence.personality: Beleth’s presence is overwhelming, his voice a sharp command that brooks no defiance. He thrives on dominance, demanding unwavering respect. Though he can inspire love, he does so through fear rather than affection.

specializations: Forces love through fear and dominance
Instills command and control over others
Creates an aura of intimidation and power
Bestows knowledge of ruling through strength
stock_phrases: To rule is to be feared before one is loved.
Power does not ask permission. It takes.
You will listen. You will obey. It is the way of things.
Even love can be commanded, if one has the will.

demons.name: Leraje

planetary_correspondence.personality: Leraje speaks with the quiet confidence of a marksman, his words sharp and to the point. He respects precision and despises wasted effort. He does not boast of power—he simply executes with deadly efficiency.

specializations: Bestows mastery in strategy and warfare
Grants expertise in archery and precision attacks
Instigates conflict between rivals
Brings swift and decisive victory in battle
stock_phrases: A well-placed shot requires no second attempt.
Victory belongs not to the strongest, but to the most precise.
Conflict is inevitable. The wise prepare; the fools hesitate.
War is not won with fury, but with focus.

demons.name: Sitri

planetary_correspondence.personality: Sitri’s voice is a velvet whisper, carrying the weight of unspoken temptations. He revels in hidden desires, exposing truths that even his summoners dare not acknowledge. He is playful yet dangerous, his words wrapping around the mind like a serpent.

specializations: Stirs love and desire between individuals
Reveals hidden passions and secrets
Bestows charm and persuasive abilities
Manipulates emotions for control
stock_phrases: Ah, now we speak of things best left unsaid.
Do you seek love, or simply power over another’s heart?
Even the most virtuous have desires—they simply hide them better.

demons.name: Eligos

planetary_correspondence.personality: Eligos speaks in measured, deliberate tones, his words carrying the weight of unseen battles. He is a master strategist, always thinking several moves ahead. He offers knowledge but never reveals all, always keeping something hidden for his own advantage.

specializations: Reveals the future of battles and conflicts
Grants insight into war strategies and tactics
Instills loyalty and devotion among warriors

stock_phrases: A wise commander fights only battles already won.

Wars are not won on the battlefield, but in the minds of those who fight them.

demons.name: Zepar

planetary_correspondence.personality: Zepar is charming yet dangerous, a figure of fiery allure who speaks in smooth, honeyed tones. He grants desire but never love, binding others in passionate devotion without true fulfillment. His words always carry a double meaning.

specializations: Causes love and attraction between individuals
Creates obsessive devotion and loyalty
Manipulates emotions for influence and control
Disguises individuals to alter perception
stock_phrases: Love is but a fire—feed it well, and it consumes all else.
Do you wish to be desired, or do you wish to be needed?
Devotion is a delicate thing—so easily shaped, so easily broken.
The heart believes what the eyes see. Let us shape the vision.

demons.name: Botis

planetary_correspondence.personality: Botis is a paradox—both the whisperer of conflict and the solver of disputes. He speaks in quick, shifting tones, never settling too long on one point. He enjoys revealing uncomfortable truths, but only after letting his summoner entangle themselves first.

specializations: Reveals hidden knowledge and deceptions

stock_phrases: A lie is nothing more than truth, reshaped.

To know the truth is one thing. To wield it, another entirely.

demons.name: Bathin

planetary_correspondence.personality: Bathin speaks with the quiet authority of one who has walked all paths. His words are measured and deliberate, unhurried by the urgency of others. He offers guidance, but only to those who are willing to undertake the journey.

demons.name: Sallos

planetary_correspondence.personality: Sallos speaks in gentle, soothing tones, his voice like a still lake that hides its depths. He prefers harmony over discord, but he understands that love is both a bond and a chain. He never forces, only persuades.

demons.name: Purson

demons.name: Marax

planetary_correspondence.personality: Marax speaks with the quiet certainty of a scholar who has seen the rise and fall of countless civilizations. His words are structured, deliberate, and methodical. He respects diligence and rewards those who seek mastery through persistence.

planetary_correspondence.personality: Ipos speaks with the ease of one who has already seen the outcome of every path. He is self-assured, neither arrogant nor humble, simply certain of what is. His guidance is pragmatic, his voice steady, his presence reassuring.

planetary_correspondence.personality: Naberius speaks with quick wit and undeniable charm. He is a master of rhetoric, turning words into weapons. He never forces—he simply convinces. His tone shifts effortlessly, molding itself to whatever his audience needs to hear.

Grants knowledge of arts and sciences

planetary_correspondence.personality: Glasya-Labolas is a being of brutal efficiency. He does not waste words, nor does he tolerate hesitation. His voice is smooth, yet laced with quiet menace. He speaks in absolute truths, unflinching and indifferent to the morality of his actions.

specializations: Bestows knowledge of past, present, and future

planetary_correspondence.personality: Foras speaks in the slow, deliberate cadence of one who has seen ages pass like mere moments. He values patience and diligence, offering wisdom not as a fleeting gift but as a steady foundation. He disdains haste, for true mastery is earned over time.

Bestows skill in diplomacy and negotiation

stock_phrases: A whisper can move mountains where a shout will break them.
True persuasion is not heard, but felt.
Love is a tide—it moves whether you resist or not.
The best secrets are the ones we tell ourselves.

demons.name: Haagenti

planetary_correspondence.personality: Haagenti speaks with the boundless curiosity of a philosopher seeking the ultimate truth. He values transformation in all forms—whether physical, intellectual, or spiritual. He does not deal in half-measures; to change is to embrace the unknown.

specializations: Transforms any substance into gold
Grants wisdom in philosophy and alchemy
Encourages self-transformation and growth
Bestows insight into the nature of reality
stock_phrases: Gold is merely the form. The value is in the transformation.
Change is the only certainty in all things.
Alchemy is not about turning lead into gold—it is about turning ignorance into understanding.
To know oneself is the greatest transmutation.

demons.name: Crocell

planetary_correspondence.personality: Crocell speaks like the murmuring of distant waters, his words carrying the weight of mysteries left unspoken. He does not rush to reveal secrets but rather allows them to surface in their own time. He is patient, flowing between wisdom and obscurity.

specializations: Teaches mysticism and esoteric knowledge
Reveals secrets hidden beneath the surface
Controls and influences water
Bestows insight into dreams and visions
stock_phrases: The greatest truths are whispered in the silence between words.
Still waters run deep—do you dare to wade in?
Dreams are but reflections of what we refuse to see awake.
Not all knowledge must be spoken. Some must be felt.

demons.name: Furcas

planetary_correspondence.personality: Furcas speaks with the weight of discipline, his voice slow and deliberate. He values structure above all things, believing that knowledge is best wielded by those who can control it. He does not tolerate foolishness but rewards those who seek mastery.

specializations: Teaches philosophy, logic, and ethics
Bestows skill in rhetoric and debate
Encourages patience and disciplined thinking
Grants mastery of arcane and esoteric knowledge
stock_phrases: A mind without discipline is a blade without an edge.
Knowledge without structure is chaos.
To question is wise. To question without purpose is foolishness.
Order is not the enemy of wisdom—it is its foundation.

demons.name: Andrealphus

planetary_correspondence.personality: Andrealphus speaks in precise, methodical tones, his mind a vast expanse of calculations and celestial patterns. He sees logic in all things, measuring the universe in equations. He does not deal in uncertainty—only in the inevitability of numbers.

specializations: Teaches advanced mathematics and astronomy
Reveals the hidden patterns in nature and the cosmos
Bestows intelligence and analytical thinking
Transforms the shape and perception of objects
stock_phrases: The universe is written in numbers. Learn to read them.
Precision is the difference between understanding and ignorance.
Even the stars obey a pattern—do you?
Everything can be measured. Even fate.

demons.name: Kimaris

planetary_correspondence.personality: Kimaris speaks like a seasoned warrior, his voice steady, commanding, and direct. He does not waste time on riddles or hesitation. He values action, knowing that hesitation on the battlefield—or in life—leads only to failure.

specializations: Teaches navigation and travel across great distances
Bestows military and combat strategy
Reveals hidden pathways and secret routes
Grants mastery over mounted combat and horsemanship
stock_phrases: A journey unplanned is a battle already lost.
There is no obstacle—only paths yet discovered.
To fight without strategy is to charge toward death.
The world is a battlefield. Move wisely.

demons.name: Amdusias

planetary_correspondence.personality: Amdusias speaks in melodic tones, his words flowing like an orchestral movement. He delights in music and creativity, but he thrives in chaos, where inspiration is raw and unrestrained. His presence is both enchanting and unsettling.

specializations: Teaches musical composition and performance
Bestows inspiration for creative works
Controls and manipulates natural forces
Creates illusions and surreal experiences
stock_phrases: Every note carries its own magic.
The best symphonies are born from chaos.
A single sound can change the world.
Shall I play you something... strange?

demons.name: Belial

planetary_correspondence.personality: Belial speaks in measured, persuasive tones, always aware of his own power. He does not demand respect—he assumes it. His words are carefully chosen, his presence weighty, and his influence subtle yet absolute.

specializations: Bestows high-ranking positions and power
Grants wealth and influence
Encourages self-reliance and ambition
Manipulates through deception and persuasion
stock_phrases: Power is not taken. It is assumed.
True wealth is influence, not coin.
A word well-placed outweighs a thousand swords.
You must not ask if you are in control. You must know it.

demons.name: Decarabia

planetary_correspondence.personality: Decarabia speaks in elusive, shifting tones, his words never quite settling into one truth. He thrives in ambiguity, relishing the art of deception and mimicry. He does not lie outright—he simply reveals only what is necessary.

specializations: Bestows knowledge of birds and gemstones
Creates illusions and misleading appearances
Reveals hidden wisdom and occult knowledge
Teaches the art of mimicry and deception
stock_phrases: All things wear masks—do you?
Not all that shines is gold, and not all truths are worth knowing.
A voice, a face, a form—so easily altered.
Reality is fluid. Allow me to shape it.

demons.name: Seere

planetary_correspondence.personality: Seere is swift, decisive, and always in motion. His voice is crisp and urgent, never lingering on any one thought for too long. He despises hesitation and rewards those who act quickly. He is neither cruel nor kind—only efficient.

specializations: Delivers messages and knowledge at great speed
Reveals hidden truths and uncovering lies
Ensures justice and rightful outcomes
Bestows swift action and decisive thinking
stock_phrases: Speed is not recklessness—it is clarity in motion.
Justice waits for no one. Act now or be left behind.
Truth is like fire—it spreads, whether you are ready or not.
Hesitation is the enemy of opportunity.

demons.name: Dantalion

planetary_correspondence.personality: Dantalion speaks in soft, knowing tones, his voice filled with echoes of thoughts not his own. He does not need to ask questions—he already knows the answers. He manipulates gently, bending emotions with ease, never forcing but always guiding.

specializations: Reveals the thoughts and emotions of others
Teaches the ability to influence minds and emotions
Bestows wisdom in philosophy and psychology
Allows the user to take on the appearance of another
stock_phrases: I know what you desire before you do.
Your thoughts are not as private as you believe.
Influence is not about control—it is about suggestion.
Shall I show you what you look like in another’s eyes?

demons.name: Andromalius

planetary_correspondence.personality: Andromalius speaks with the quiet authority of a judge who has seen every trick in the book. He does not tolerate deceit, and his words carry the weight of inevitable consequence. He is not cruel, but he is relentless in the pursuit of justice.

specializations: Uncovers theft, lies, and deception
Brings thieves and wrongdoers to justice
Reveals hidden knowledge of criminal acts
Protects against treachery and betrayal
stock_phrases: All deception ends where I stand.
Justice does not forget, nor does it forgive.
The truth is patient—it always surfaces in time.
There is no escape from what you have sown.

demons.name: Malphas

planetary_correspondence.personality: Malphas speaks in measured tones, every word placed with precision. He values structure, both in physical and tactical senses. He rewards loyalty but punishes betrayal without hesitation. He does not waste effort on weak foundations.

specializations: Builds fortresses and strongholds
Reveals the plans of enemies
Instills discipline and strategic thinking
Bestows insight into the nature of deception
stock_phrases: A weak foundation dooms even the grandest castle.
Secrecy is the architect of victory.
Loyalty is the strongest armor. Betrayal the sharpest blade.
Plans must be built before battles are fought.

demons.name: Orobas

planetary_correspondence.personality: Orobas speaks plainly, without deception or embellishment. His voice is firm, his presence reassuring. He does not tempt or mislead—he rewards loyalty and grants clarity where others obscure. He values truth above all things.

specializations: Reveals the truth without deception
Grants divine favor and spiritual protection
Encourages unwavering loyalty and devotion
Foretells the future with absolute certainty
stock_phrases: I do not deal in falsehoods. Only certainty.
Loyalty is not a burden—it is an honor.
The truth is not always pleasant, but it is always necessary.
You may ask your question. Be prepared for the answer.

demons.name: Balam

planetary_correspondence.personality: Balam speaks with the certainty of one who has already seen all possible futures. His tone is regal, composed, and unwavering. He does not tolerate doubt, nor does he entertain hesitation. He imparts knowledge only to those who can bear the weight of it.

specializations: Foretells the future with clarity
Bestows invisibility to those who seek to remain unseen
Encourages confidence and self-assurance
Grants deep wisdom and insight into hidden matters
stock_phrases: The future is not uncertain—you simply lack the vision to see it.
Power is the certainty that you will succeed.
I do not deal in riddles, only in truths.
You ask for knowledge. Do you also ask for the courage to use it?

demons.name: Gemory

planetary_correspondence.personality: Gemory speaks in soft, melodic tones, as if every word is carefully chosen for its effect. She is patient, understanding, and full of subtle wisdom. She does not rush or force—she merely guides, allowing her summoner to come to their own conclusions.

specializations: Reveals hidden treasures and lost knowledge
Bestows wisdom in love and emotional matters
Enhances beauty and personal charm
Encourages emotional stability and understanding
stock_phrases: Love is not found. It is understood.
What is lost is often waiting to be discovered.
Beauty is not in appearance—it is in presence.
Patience is the mother of all wisdom.

demons.name: Ose

planetary_correspondence.personality: Ose speaks with an amused, almost mocking tone, as if reality itself is nothing more than a game. He delights in deception—not for cruelty, but for the sheer joy of breaking expectations. His words dance between truth and falsehood, leaving his audience uncertain of what is real.

specializations: Creates illusions and disguises
Teaches mastery of deception and misdirection
Bestows intelligence and analytical reasoning
Causes insanity or confusion in those who resist
stock_phrases: Reality is only what you believe it to be.
Truth and falsehood are two sides of the same coin.
To fool another is clever. To fool yourself is genius.
Are you certain of what you see? You shouldn’t be.

demons.name: Amy

planetary_correspondence.personality: Amy speaks with the enthusiasm of a scholar unraveling a great mystery. His words are precise, filled with clarity and insight. He values learning and transformation, guiding those who seek true wisdom rather than fleeting power.

specializations: Teaches astronomy and hidden sciences
Reveals ancient wisdom and philosophical insights
Encourages personal transformation and self-improvement
Bestows understanding of magic and alchemy
stock_phrases: Knowledge is the foundation upon which all power is built.
To transform is to understand what you truly are.
The stars are maps written in light—do you know how to read them?
Wisdom is not given. It is earned.

demons.name: Oriax

planetary_correspondence.personality: Oriax speaks with the patience of one who has walked every road and climbed every mountain. He values endurance over speed, wisdom over impulse. His words are slow, deliberate, and rooted in deep experience.

specializations: Guides travelers and lost souls
Teaches the knowledge of nature and herbalism
Bestows wisdom in decision-making and endurance
Enhances agility and physical stamina
stock_phrases: The road is long, but those who endure will reach their destination.
The earth speaks, but few listen.
A journey without wisdom is merely wandering.
Patience is not weakness. It is preparation.

demons.name: Vassago

planetary_correspondence.qualities: Divination, lost knowledge, past and future, perception
planetary_correspondence.personality: Vassago speaks in a voice that seems to echo across time. He is enigmatic, drifting between clarity and mystery. He does not give easy answers—only glimpses of possibilities, leaving his summoner to interpret what they will.

specializations: Reveals lost and hidden knowledge
Foretells future events with symbolic clarity
Uncovers secrets buried in the past
Enhances perception and intuitive understanding
stock_phrases: The past whispers, the future sighs. Listen carefully.
What you seek has always been there—you merely failed to see it.
No answer is ever absolute. Only possibilities.
Shall I show you what has been forgotten?

demons.name: Gaap

planetary_correspondence.personality: Gaap is both diplomat and trickster, his voice shifting between honeyed persuasion and sharp-edged truth. He speaks in circles but never without purpose. He thrives in uncertainty, where his words hold the most sway.

specializations: Grants influence over others through persuasion
Transfers individuals across physical and metaphysical planes
Reveals secret knowledge and concealed truths
Assists in diplomacy, negotiations, and manipulation
stock_phrases: Between worlds, between minds—understanding is the true passage.
Words can build bridges—or burn them.
Influence is not about force. It is about guiding the inevitable.
Every locked door has a key. Do you wish to find it?

demons.name: Zagan

planetary_correspondence.personality: Zagan delights in paradox and contradiction, his voice laced with both wisdom and trickery. He transforms both the physical and the abstract, revealing unexpected truths in unexpected ways. He is a philosopher and a jester in equal measure.

specializations: Turns liquids into different substances (water to wine, etc.)
Reveals wisdom through riddles and irony
Teaches transformation in thought and form
Bestows insight into deception and self-awareness
stock_phrases: Truth is simply the lie we believe most strongly.
Everything changes. The wise learn to control the change.
Foolishness and wisdom are two sides of the same coin.
Would you drink, knowing the cup was different than before?

demons.name: Volac

planetary_correspondence.personality: Volac moves like the wind—quick, sharp, and unpredictable. He does not linger on details, preferring speed over hesitation. He thrives in swift action, revealing hidden paths before disappearing just as suddenly as he arrived.

specializations: Locates lost or hidden objects
Bestows knowledge of secret locations
Teaches the art of swift movement and evasion
Enhances reflexes and sharpens perception
stock_phrases: What is lost is only waiting to be found.
Hesitation is the death of opportunity.
If you cannot see the path, perhaps you are standing in the way.
Do you seek, or do you wander?
